oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil Defense identification chains introduced in Nashville, Tennessee, 1954 December
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The introduction of Civil Defense identification chains in Nashville, Tennessee with Mayor Ben West, December 1954. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974
